thread.title: Don't bother contacting if you leave something there - they will not respond!
thread.title_full: Don't bother contacting if you leave something there - they will not respond! - Review of The Gallivant Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: missdd2014
title: Don't bother contacting if you leave something there - they will not respond!
text:
I'll start by saying it's a shame for the 1 star because I was prepared to give a detailed review and I even took some pics to share but after returning home and trying to contact them with regard to an item left behind and receiving nothing back, forget it.
I'm not prepared to review a hotel when they don't have the decency to respond a simple yes or no to a question for an item of sentimental value left behind.
I have emailed, telephoned (no answer), Twittered & Facebooked them but nothing!
Shocking to me that they can't even be bothered to reply?!
So, for crap customer service, you get 1. And that's only because I can't give a zero.
